2164.subject: SPED
2164.course_title_long: Initial Semester Practicum: Mild to Moderate
2164.descrlong:
This field experience course is required for all candidates in the Preliminary Mild to Moderate Credential Program during their initial semester.  This field experience requirement, along with the SPED 567 seminar, provides practical field experience opportunities teaching students with mild/moderate disabilities in K-12 public and non-public school settings.  Additionally, the course provides candidates with knowledge of typical and atypical human development.  Offered fall and spring.

(Coreq: SPED 567)
